page.title: 06JOBS IN PULBOROUGH.
page.content: A group of pupils from St.Mary's School asked their parents questions about their jobs.We had 76 replies. No replies came from anyone unemployed. There is not much industrial development, APV Spiro-Gills is the biggest factory. 9% of parents work in catering, 7% in cleaning. Building and engineering employ 6% each,and 5% work in farming(surprisingly few), finance, management, and as mechanics. The rest work in a wide variety of jobs (e.g. education, civil service, publishing, gardening). One person reads the BBC News.45% of our sample work in Pulborough and another 29% work within 10 miles. Only 7% work in London; one parent travels up to 500 miles away, and one goes to work by plane. 71% of people go to work by car, 21% often walk, only 7% go by train, and 3% may bike.
